TopicTitle: Mouse scroll doesn't control zoom and does a fish eye-like camera effect instead.

Articles.Content:
I just (probably) clicked something and now the scroll does that camera effect and I can't control throttle anymore and how do I undo this because goddammit I'm in the middle of a transfer burn and it makes me angry.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-10T15:16:42Z" title="06/10/2015 03:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 10, 2015</time> by Veeltch**
Usually you have to hold Alt while scrolling to change the field of view like you're describing. Perhaps a stuck key?

> 
> Usually you have to hold Alt while scrolling to change the field of view like you're describing. Perhaps a stuck key?

THANK YOU!

No, it's not stuck. I must've held it when clicked Escape button and it got "virtually" stuck, I guess.

E: Oh, btw is there any way to reset it?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-10T15:19:07Z" title="06/10/2015 03:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 10, 2015</time> by Veeltch**
